projects.name: TwitchReact

description.content: TwitchReact is a Twitch viewing client built with React. In its current state, TwitchReact displays a list of the top games being streamed on Twitch. Each game page contains game info from the IGDB API and the top streams on Twitch, which are viewable within the app itself.
Future development: search implementation, enhanced streamer profiles, and refined app styling

projects.tech: HTML, CSS/SASS, React, Express, Node.js, Twitch & Internet Games Database APIs
